amendment.description: Amendment sought to amend a waiver on prohibition of use of atomic energy defense funding for work with Russia to allow the Secretary of Energy to issue a waiver if such activity will significantly reduce the nuclear threat, regardless of backlog at DOE defense nuclear facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 114-569 to amend waiver on prohibition of use of atomic energy defense funding for work with Russia to allow the Secretary of Energy to issue waiver if activity will significantly reduce the nuclear threat, regardless of backlog at DOE defense nuclear facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Larsen (WA) amendment Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Larsen (WA).
